detaileddescription.para: To get started using the library you first have to download it for your platform( MacOS, Windows, or Linux). After that you have to add the include folder to your compiler's path and the lib folder to your compiler's link path and link with either the static or shared version, whatever you choose. If you use CMake: link_directories(${PATH_TO_SOFTRENDER}/lib/) add_executable(my_exec${YOUR_SOURCES}) target_include_directories(my_execPRIVATE${PATH_TO_SOFTRENDER}/include/) target_link_libraries(my_execPRIVATESoftRender)#OrSoftRender-shared
